## MeshMaterial.cullMode property

Face culling mode: 'none' \| 'front' \| 'back'. - Does not force shader rebuild; affects rasterizer state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get cullMode(): FaceMode;

set cullMode(val: FaceMode);
```
